:orphan:

Choosing Atlas
==================

Choosing the atlas you want to submit your data to is a big decision!  Hopefully this article will guide you to 
what atlas you should submit your data to.

+----------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| Atlas                                        | Description                        |
+==============================================+====================================+
| Atlas of Living Australia (ALA)              | Data on Australian Flora and Fauna |
+----------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| Global Biodiversity Information Forum (GBIF) | Global Occurrences                 |
+----------------------------------------------+------------------------------------+

Back to `Getting Started <index.html>`_.
